sentences.en: A destroyer escorted our ship to London.
sentences.cn: 一艘驱逐舰护送我们的船到伦敦.
一艘驱逐舰将他打捞上船.

sentences.en: A drum roll of thumps pounded the destroyer's hull.
sentences.cn: 一连串的重击鼓声传遍了驱逐舰的船壳.

sentences.en: As quickly as possible , we put a destroyer on the tail of every submarine.
sentences.cn: 于是我们火速派出驱逐舰跟踪每一艘潜水艇.

sentences.en: Before long, Thrawn attained command of an Imperial Star Destroyer, the Vengeance.
sentences.cn: 不久, 索龙获得帝国歼星舰“复仇号”的指挥权.

sentences.en: In a few hours, the destroyer drew on the convoy.
sentences.cn: 几小时后, 驱逐舰就赶上了护航舰队.

sentences.en: Sugar is the destroyer of healthy teeth.
sentences.cn: 糖可以危害健全的牙齿。

sentences.en: The company is the world's largest destroyer of tropical forests.
sentences.cn: 该公司对热带雨林的破坏位居世界之首。

sentences.en: The destroyer was turning to a collision course.
sentences.cn: 驱逐舰改为迎面开来的航向.
驱逐舰正在紧急地发着灯光信号.

sentences.en: The royal destroyer employs lots of loyal employees.
sentences.cn: 皇家驱逐舰雇佣了很多忠心的雇员。

sentences.en: The security and warmth of the destroyer sick bay were wonderful.
sentences.cn: 驱逐舰的病房很安全,也很温暖,简直棒极了. (名词转换成形容词,形容词转换成副词)

sentences.en: The three main god figures are Brahma the creator, Vishnu the preserver and Siva the destroyer.
sentences.cn: 三个主要的神是创造之神梵天 、 守护之神毗湿奴和破坏之神湿婆.

sentences.en: This merchant ship was convoyed by a destroyer.
sentences.cn: 这艘商船由一驱逐舰护航.

sentences.en: We deceived the enemy by disguising the destroyer as a freighter.
sentences.cn: 我们把驱逐舰伪装成运输船蒙蔽敌人.

words.tran_cn: [船][军]驱逐舰；破坏者；起破坏作用的事物

trans.tran_cn: 驱逐舰，破坏者，扑灭者，驱逐者，起破坏作用的事物
trans.tran_en: a small fast military ship with guns
